entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:22 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -34.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 12:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -34.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -38.1°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 38.
